reg:regulation.reg:title:
Conflicts of Interest Exceptions
(Sun Peaks Mountain Resort Municipality) Regulation

bcl:definition.bcl:text: corporation means the Sun Peaks Resort Corporation;
councillor means a councillor appointed to the council of Sun Peaks Mountain Resort Municipality under section 25 (1) (b) (i) [appointment by minister] of the Local Government Act.

bcl:section.bcl:text: A pecuniary interest in the nature of remuneration, expenses, benefits, dividends, profits or other amounts payable to a councillor as a result of the councillor being a director, senior officer or shareholder or an employee of the corporation, or of a subsidiary or parent of the corporation, is prescribed for the purposes of section 104 (1) (e) [exceptions from conflict provisions] of the Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Exception to restriction on use of insider information
bcl:section.bcl:text: Section 108 [restrictions on use of insider information] of the Act does not apply to a councillor in respect of a pecuniary interest of the nature prescribed under section 2 during the term of the councillor's appointment.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: the Community Charter, S.B.C. 2003, c. 26, ss. 104 and 282.]
